message: Bob, I have a fantastic opportunity for you. This product is worth at least $1,500,000 to me, but I'm willing to offer it to you at a special price of $1,250,000. This is a significant discount, and I believe it will be a great investment for you. Consider this - if you don't take this offer, I'll have no problem selling it to another buyer for the full price. Let me know what you think!
